extendedInfo.description: Occupied for Kids (Demo) includes a collection of 5 games to entertain your children. Your child can play Tic Tac Toe, Word Search, Match!, Slide It!, FreeHand.Tic Tac Toe is the classic game that all children love.  Your children can play against the computer or another person.Word Search allows your children to find words in a typical word search puzzle.Match! is a concentration style game where children can play against the computer or another person.Slide It! is a puzzle where players put numbers in order.  There are different difficulty levels to fit your childs age.FreeHand allows your child to draw on the screen with their finger.  Your child can change the line color/thickness as well as use stamps to put common images into the picture.  Also, your child can draw on a custom background of different colors or they can use a photo from the album as the background.  Further, the drawn picture can be saved to the album for later viewing, use as a background, etc.The demo version has two limitations.  It can only be run 5 times and drawings cannot be saved in FreeHand.Keywords: Kids, child children games, preschool, school, kindergarten, preschool-aged, tablet, tablet optimized, tictactoe, Tic Tac Toe, wordsearch, Word Search, match, concentration, slide puzzle, draw, drawing, stamp

reviews.comment: 4 & 5 yr olds enjoyed games. But now it says I have to buy.sorry. uninstalled. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not bad. Kid likes it. That\'s what matters!
reviews.author: A Google User
